Package io.odysz.semantic.syn

Class ExchangeContext

java.lang.Object
io.odysz.semantic.syn.ExchangeContext
public class ExchangeContext extends Object
Handling exchange session with remote node. This is different from DBSynmantext which is used for handling local data integration and database semantics.
Author:
Ody
